Organizations to check out

There are tons of amazing organizations working towards defunding the police and abolition. Make sure to check out:

  • 8 to Abolition
  • Survived & Punished NY
  • Prison Culture
  • Abolitionist Futures
  • Communities United for Police Reform
  • Incarcerated Workers Organizing Committee

Other resources

There are also a number of amazing resources, and calls for defunding and abolition that have been put together by fellow abolitionists in NYC.

  • K-Agbebiyi’s Guide to Abolition
  • Abolitionist Recommendations to Defund NYPD, with No New Jails + By Closing Rikers Now
  • Open letter from City gender-based violence serving employees, survivors, and allies: radically invest in survivors, divest from and abolish carceral systems

If you come across other resources, recommendations, and organizations to highlight here: feel free to send us a DM or email at abolishthenypd@gmail.com. abolishthenypd@gmail.com
